thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Puerto Rico governor announces public education overhaul

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Puerto Rico governor announces public education overhaul
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Puerto Ricoâ€™s governor said his administration will unveil a broad education reform bill on Tuesday, which will include the introduction of school vouchers and charter schools to the bankrupt U.S. territory.
Speaking in a radio address on Monday, Governor Ricardo Rossello added that every public school teacher in Puerto Rico would receive a $1,500 annual salary increase next school year. (Reporting by a contributor in San Juan Editing by Jonathan Oatis)
